Content.Text:
Dum-Da-Da-DAA!
It's morning, <MYNAME>!
Time to wake up!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>!
You've been in high spirits recently,
haven't you?
<PAGE>
Since things are going so well with your
romantic interest, you must be loving
life every day!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, there I go prying into your love
life! But it's a wonderful thing!
<PAGE>
Today, your Harvest Goddess, guardian of
eternal love, is going to teach you how
to <RED>propose marriage</RED>!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
For your marriage proposal to succeed,
you have to <RED>renovate your house</RED>, <RED>have
enough affection</RED>, and a <GREEN>blue feather</GREEN>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Because your spouse will live with you,
you will need a bigger house. Acquire
<GREEN>house blueprints</GREEN> and renovate!
<PAGE>
Maybe if you revitalize the town, you'll
be able to buy <GREEN>house blueprints</GREEN>?
<PAGE>
You will also need a <GREEN>double bed</GREEN>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since your spouse will live with you,
you need to make your house bigger
first. Renovate your house please!
<PAGE>
You will also need a <GREEN>double bed</GREEN>.
You need enough bed space for two to
sleep, right? Be prepared!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since your spouse will live with you,
you need a bed that sleeps two. That
means a <GREEN>double bed</GREEN>, right?
<PAGE>
You should be able to buy <GREEN>double bed
blueprints</GREEN> in a shop.
So get that ready!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you have renovated your house
and have a <GREEN>double bed</GREEN>.
There are just two more conditions.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Affection is shown by the color of your
romantic interest's heart. Red means
your proposal will surely be accepted.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then there's the <GREEN>Blue Feather</GREEN>.
It's the custom here to give a <GREEN>Blue 
Feather</GREEN> when you propose marriage.
<PAGE>
The <BLUE>General Store</BLUE> should sell <GREEN>Blue
Feathers.</GREEN> Don't miss your chance
to propose! Keep it handy in your bag!!!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When you want someone to propose to you,
it's important to encourage them.
<PAGE>
For example, giving them gifts.
<RED>Giving lots of gifts</RED> would
probably help.
<PAGE>
Maybe then the person will propose to
you.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that's the story with proposals of
marriage! I'll be going now.
Toodles!
